[stage-1 2/4] WORKDIR /dest [cached]
[builder 2/3] WORKDIR /src [cached]
[builder 3/3] RUN echo hi > hi.txt
[builder 3/3] RUN echo hi > hi.txt [done: 310ms]
[stage-1 3/4] COPY --from=builder /dest/hi.txt /src/hi.txt
